existing_features.title: In the Bio tab (Bio page), update the section currently titled "International Experience" to be titled "International Educational Experience" and replace the existing descriptive paragraph with a clearly formatted list containing exactly these locations (one per line/bullet): Berlin, Germany; Zurich, Switzerland; Milan, Italy; London, England; Johannesburg, South Africa; Antigua, Guatemala.

new_feature_requests.summary: Bio tab: Rename "International Experience" to "International Educational Experience" and list locations (Berlin, Zurich, Milan, London, Johannesburg, Antigua)

projectName: Update Bio tab International Experience section title and locations
